QuestData.Title: Prized Repossessions
QuestData.Description: The Gordunni have plagued the people of Shattrath ever since the city was founded. Over time they amassed quite a hoard of weapons they captured from our defenders in raids.$b$bGetting these weapons in the hands of our soldiers would be practical and I personally would like to get them out of the hands of the ogres.$b$bWhile we are in here can you do me a favor and gather up any of those weapons you come across.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Shattrath Guardian Maces from Gordunni Bashers or Gordunni Cleavers within Gordal Fortress.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to find any weapons?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, commander. With this a great dishonor on the legacy of Shattrath has been removed.
